> # Outlier multivariat (Mahalanobis)
> 
> mat <- df1_clean[plant_vars] %>% as.matrix()
> mat_ok <- mat[complete.cases(mat), ]
> center <- colMeans(mat_ok)
> S <- cov(mat_ok)
> md2 <- mahalanobis(mat_ok, center, S)
> pvals <- pchisq(md2, df = ncol(mat_ok), lower.tail = FALSE)
> multivar_outliers <- rownames(mat_ok)[pvals < 0.001]
> cat("\n-- Outlier Multivariat (p < 0.001) --\n"); print(multivar_outliers)

-- Outlier Multivariat (p < 0.001) --
[1] "Sumatera Utara" "Jawa Barat"     "Jawa Tengah"    "Jawa Timur"    
> 
> # Multikolinearitas (VIF)
> 
> vif_vals <- sapply(plant_vars, function(target){
+   others <- setdiff(plant_vars, target)
+   d <- df1_clean %>% select(all_of(c(target, others))) %>% na.omit()
+   if(nrow(d) < 5) return(NA)
+   m <- lm(as.formula(paste0(target," ~ ",paste(others,collapse=" + "))), data = d)
+   v <- try(car::vif(m), silent = TRUE)
+   if(inherits(v,"try-error")) return(NA)
+   return(max(v))
+ })
> cat("\n-- NILAI VIF (maks per regresi) --\n"); print(vif_vals)

> # ------------------------- SOAL 1b: CLUSTERING (Ward) -------------------
> 
> df_scale <- df1_clean[plant_vars] %>%
+   mutate_all(~ ifelse(is.na(.), median(.,na.rm=TRUE), .)) %>%
+   scale()
> 
> dist_mat <- dist(df_scale, method="euclidean")
> hc <- hclust(dist_mat, method="ward.D2")
> 
> # Plot dendrogram (akan tampil di output HTML)
> 
> plot(hc, main="Dendrogram Ward – Soal 1b", xlab="", sub="")
knitr::include_graphics("C:/Users/Lenovo/Pictures/SMT EVAL 5_6 RIZKY/Dendogram Ward - soal 1b.png")

> # ------------------------- SOAL 1c: PEMILIHAN JUMLAH CLUSTER ------------
> 
> set.seed(123)
> 
> # Silhouette rekomendasi (visual): fviz_nbclust akan membuat plot otomatis
> 
> plot(factoextra::fviz_nbclust(df_scale, hcut, method="silhouette")$data, type="n") # safe call, main plot shown by fviz
> 
> # Pilih k (contoh): 3 — praktikan bisa ubah sesuai NbClust/silhouette
> 
> k <- 3
> clusters <- cutree(hc, k=k)
> cat("\n-- Distribusi Cluster (k=", k, ") --\n", sep=""); print(table(clusters))
